title: Get this Pyrex Cook & Heat bundle for just £34.99
content:
Whether you’re a batch-cooking convert or simply want to cut down on your food wastage, let Pyrex’s Cook & Heat range make storing – and reheating – your food a doddle. Specially designed for microwave use, these clever food containers are equipped with two easy-locking clips and an integrated steam release vent for safer use, while the airtight lid keeps your food fresher for longer. And you’ll never have to worry about flavours intermingling as the borosilicate glass doesn’t absorb aromas – and it’s 100% stain free! With this exclusive bundle deal, you can get your hands on four of these incredible roasters for just £34.99, plus £2.95 for standard delivery or £4.50 fast delivery.

Claim your offer

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Along with a more convenient cooking experience, you’ll get the Pyrex Cook & Heat roasters in the following sizes: 1.0L, 1.1L, 2.2L, 2.3, and these cool features…

  • Extreme temperature support from -40°C to +300°C
  • Airtight BPA-free lid with sliding valve and locking clip lid
  • Stackable design to save fridge space
  • Scratch-resistant glass
  • BPA-free glass that’s resistant to stain and odours
  • Dishwasher safe

Offer ends 18/06/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

author: Steve Newell
